intro.p_title: SK Chemicals always looks <br class='pc_only'/> for ways to make better pharmaceutical products

1.title: Overview
1.description: R&D is the source of competitiveness for pharmaceutical companies. As such, SK Chemicals has committed its research capabilities in developing pharmaceutical products with global competitiveness. SK Chemicals Research Center holds outstanding competencies and expertise across all stages of pharmaceutical R&D including drug formulations research, analytical research, process development and manufacturing of various dosage forms.

2.title: Quality by Design
2.description: R&D is the source of competitiveness for pharmaceutical companies. As such, SK Chemicals has committed its research capabilities in developing pharmaceutical products with global competitiveness. SK Chemicals Central Research Center holds outstanding competencies and expertise across all stages of pharmaceutical R&D including drug formulations research, analytical research, process development and manufacturing of various dosage forms.

pharma.p_title: SK Chemicals는 더 나은 신약을 만들기 위해 <br class='pc_only' /> 끊임없이 고민하고 연구합니다

aim.title: Goal
description: Based on experts in each field, we aim to lead the success of developing new drugs and develops new global drugs to promote human health.
Through open innovation, joint research with promising ventures will be conducted, and based on this, the development of new drugs will lead to success.

fields.title: Fields of research
fields.description: The Open Innovation team selected NASH (non-alcoholic steatohepatitis) and IPF (Idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis) as key disease areas, focusing on discovery of First-in-Class drugs. Meanwhile, we are expanding our disease area to other indications that require strategic technological innovation in addition to the two diseases.

research.p_title: SK Chemicals 오픈이노베이션 팀은 <br class='pc_only' /> 끊임없이 고민하고 연구합니다

aim.title: 연구 목표
aim.description: 효과적인 치료법이 없는 적응증을 중심으로 오픈 이노베이션을 통해 보다 효율적인 신약개발 연구에 초점을 두고 있습니다.

strategy.title: 연구 전략
strategy.description: 오픈 이노베이션을 통한 다양한 파트너사와의 공동연구를 바탕으로 인공지능(AI) 신약 및 표적단백질 분해 (Targeted Protein Degradation) 등의 차세대 기술을 이용하여 혁신적인 신약개발의 성공 가능성을 극대화하고 있습니다.

capacity.title: 연구 역량
description: 연구 전문 인력을 중심으로 중점 질환을 극복할 수 있는 신규 타깃 발굴을 수행하고 있으며, 약효, 합성, 독성 및 PK 전문인력들이 후보물질 도출과 검증을 진행하고 있습니다.
임상, 허가, 약가, 생산 및 마케팅 등 전문 부서와 협업하여 신약개발의 전 단계를 수행할 수 있는 역량을 보유하고 있습니다.

investments.p_title: SK Chemicals pursues <br class='pc_only'/> shared growth with the venture industry

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: The future of the pharmaceutical industry depends on cooperation, hence innovation requires investment. In order to solve the new problem of healthcare thrown by the rapidly changing era, SK Chemicals actively supports promising bio-ventures at home and abroad.

aim.title: Aim
aim.description: SK Chemicals wants to cooperate as a strategic investor with bio venture companies with excellent R&D capabilities and technology. We are looking for a venture company that will share the fruits of its performance by jointly striving for the successful development and commercialization of technology and corporate growth.

fields.title: Fields of research
fields.description: In addition to the key areas where SK Chemicals can fully utilize its experiences and capabilities, we are also actively considering future technology areas that will drive trends in the pharmaceutical industry.

strategic.title: Strategic focus areas
list: Promising technologies that can be applied to NASH (non-alcoholic steatohepatitis), fibrosis disease, and rheumatoid arthritis, which are internal R&D focus areas.
New drug candidates in areas where SK Chemicals has an understanding of the market and diseases, such as nervous system, musculoskeletal system, and urinary system diseases, etc.

future.title: Future leading edge technology areas
list: Future technologies that present new paradigms such as targeted protein decomposition, gene therapy, and cell therapy.
New drug candidates that have potential for diseases with high medical unmet demand, such as Alzheimer's disease, autoimmune disease, and cancer.

career.title: Investment History
career.description: SK Chemicals is seeking various strategic investment opportunities.

li_title.2: The purpose of collection and use of personal information
li_title.3: Period of possession and use of personal information

li_txt.1:
We collect your personal information for user sign up, customer consultations, and service requests.
  • Personal information : email address, and contact information
  • Means of collection : our website (Ask a Question)
li_txt.2:
We use our customers' personal information for the purposes stated below.
  • Management
  • To handle customer complaints and feedback
li_txt.3: Your personal information will be destroyed without exception or delay after our customer support team achieves the purpose for which the information was collected and used.
